blockquote.p: basic_regex member functions shall not call any locale dependent C or C++ API, including the formatted string input functions. Instead they shall call the appropriate traits member function to achieve the required effect.

discussion.p: Yet, the required interface for a regular expression traits class () does not appear to have any reliable method for determining whether a character as encoded for the locale associated with the traits instance is the same as a character represented by a UnicodeEscapeSequence, e.g., assuming a sane ru_RU.koi8r locale:
Which means that the character class matching worked, but not the matching to the UnicodeEscapeSequence.
